short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically saves drafts in Strapi CMS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension designed to enable automatic saving for Strapi draft collection types enhances the content management experience by streamlining the process of saving drafts. 

Note : This extension is compatible with Strapi v4.20.4.

Overview

This Chrome extension integrates seamlessly with Strapi, a popular headless CMS, to automatically save drafts of content entries every minute. It is particularly useful for users who frequently create or edit content within Strapi and want to ensure that their work is continuously saved without manual intervention.

Note : AutoSave is only enabled for draft content entries not for published ones

Features

Automatic Draft Saving: The extension automatically saves any changes made to draft entries without requiring users to click the "Save" button manually.

Adding Autosave features similar to Wordpress in Strapi.

Benefits

Enhanced Productivity: By automating the saving process, users can focus more on content creation rather than worrying about losing unsaved changes. This leads to a more efficient workflow.

How to use 

After Installing the extension , we can click on the "Run script" button and Strapi draft content entries will be automatically saved every minute.

Note : we have to enable back the script whenever we change the urls
